title: Coral Springs, Florida
summary: Coral Springs, officially the City of Coral Springs, is a city in Broward County, Florida, United States, approximately 20 miles (32Â km) northwest of Fort Lauderdale. As of the 2010 United States Census, the city had a population of 121,096.[6] It is a principal city of the Miami metropolitan area, which was home to an estimated 6,012,331 people at the 2015 census.
